subtitles:
44816 48252 [ Girl ] People once believed
that when someone dies...

48320 52620 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

56127 61394 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

64603 69597 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

123828 128356 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

128433 131698 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

135273 139232 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

141646 144877 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

146384 149217 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

149287 154156 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

157128 160461 [ Man ] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

160532 165333 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

165403 167701 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

167772 170639 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

170709 173303 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

173378 176836 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

176915 179941 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

188159 192357 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

192430 194660 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

194733 198669 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

211583 215610 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

215687 218952 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
225397 227627 You lied to her about Eric.

229367 233098 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

244549 250273 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.

272729 276756 [ Sarah ] A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

276833 279734 I used to think that was true
about everything...

284274 288210 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

288278 292647 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

330885 334082 What are you,
like the night watchman?

355410 358777 You know, what this place
needs is a...

361282 365685 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

365753 368745 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
368823 371121 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
371192 374252 Hey, hey, let me do it.

374329 378356 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

378433 380867 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

380935 382869 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

392680 396514 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

396584 400520 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

402457 406154 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

406227 409458 - They make you fart big time.
- [ Chuckling ]

415770 418500 [ Man ] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

418573 421201 from all the crap
floating around in it.

422377 426108 I wish I could have seen that.
[ Whistling ]

530017 533953 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

556911 560312 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

567555 570149 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

578199 580861 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

580935 584234 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ Woman Shouting ]

700488 705084 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.

715102 718162 - [ Shelly ] No! Eric!
- [ Man ] See ya!

768747 771682 - Hey, that's good.
- [ Man ] That's good.

775554 779149 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

782494 786931 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

790602 792593 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

795841 799538 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?

824336 828636 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

828707 832609 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

832678 835772 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
835848 838646 Fire it up! Fire it up!

841887 843878 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

879258 882750 - I love you.
- Say that again.

896508 899705 - [ Sarah ] Wow, you look great.
- [ Shelly ] Ta-da!

906752 909312 - Come here! [ Laughing ]
- No, no, no!
956101 959662 # It doesn't matter how you hide #
959738 963071 # We find you if we're wanting to #

965444 969278 # So slide back down
and close your eyes #

969348 973546 # Sleep a while
you must be tired #

1010055 1014082 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
1016561 1021089 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1025771 1028433 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

1028507 1031340 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

1040185 1043348 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [ Siren Wailing ]

1046491 1048857 Close the gate
when you go out!

1048927 1051589 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1054266 1057702 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1062407 1066867 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1087766 1092533 # That point me to another day #

1171883 1175046 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1227347 1230009 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1230083 1234179 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1234254 1237655 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1237724 1240284 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1240360 1245229 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1245298 1250235 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1255909 1261711 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1270957 1275860 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1275929 1280559 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1285272 1287832 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1324144 1330014 # Sometimes it rains inside my head #

1337924 1342224 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- It's a mess.
1347434 1349527 # No, they don't have to take you #

1349603 1352367 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1352439 1357035 # No, they don't have
to take you away #

1357110 1360443 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1361548 1363482 Give me some of that
over there!

1365719 1369416 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1369489 1374256 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1374327 1378161 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1378231 1382429 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1382502 1386563 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1429516 1434180 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1471958 1478090 # No, they don't have
to take you away #

1484738 1487901 [ Man ] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1506493 1512022 - [ Clearing Throat ]
- I told you to stay out of here.

1512098 1515761 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1515835 1519862 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1525779 1528771 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1534454 1538151 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
- [ Laughing ]
1553173 1555607 Who the fuck is this now?

1562649 1566483 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1574093 1578359 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1586005 1590374 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1590443 1594379 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."

1601521 1605651 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1608061 1611053 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1642795 1648097 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1649736 1653194 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1655909 1659572 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1666953 1669922 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1669989 1673049 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1673126 1675924 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1675995 1680159 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1680233 1684966 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1685038 1686972 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1687040 1690806 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1692011 1694411 What the hell
do you call that?

1698151 1701917 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1701988 1704752 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1714469 1717097 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1717172 1720073 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1720141 1724544 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1724613 1730142 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1733722 1736316 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1753174 1757406 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1781269 1784204 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1787442 1790309 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1790378 1793006 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1793081 1795481 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1795550 1800647 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1807629 1810393 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1810465 1813127 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1814803 1818204 Each one of these is a life...

1827315 1831479 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1840128 1844326 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1846234 1850295 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1850371 1854000 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1878466 1881924 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1889110 1893570 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1908463 1912399 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1912467 1917632 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1921075 1925444 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1925513 1928641 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1930518 1933715 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1933788 1937781 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1940595 1945191 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1945266 1950101 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1950171 1954631 - It's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1954709 1957143 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1957212 1961808 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1961883 1964477 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1964552 1968044 - [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1968122 1973492 - [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1973561 1977224 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1983004 1986405 - [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

1996184 1998778 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1998853 2001185 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2001256 2007092 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2015470 2018701 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2018773 2023005 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2059213 2063172 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2063251 2066482 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2066554 2068317 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2071125 2074458 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2074529 2076827 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2076898 2081460 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2081536 2084096 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2084172 2087369 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2090044 2092604 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2092680 2095478 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.

2098419 2102446 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2102523 2106983 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2107061 2108926 Call it my need to know.

2150271 2153570 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2157445 2161745 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2161816 2164876 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2169023 2173756 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2174929 2178421 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2195364 2199960 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2200035 2204369 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2207943 2212175 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"

2214383 2217250 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2217319 2221415 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2221490 2227395 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2227463 2231024 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2231100 2235093 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2242111 2245842 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2248117 2252850 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2289124 2292821 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2317686 2320314 - There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- # No more #

2358927 2363455 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2370339 2373365 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2381283 2386118 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2388123 2393060 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2417652 2420382 Stop me if you heard this one.

2428797 2431561 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2435270 2437500 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2443011 2447607 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2449818 2453914 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2478146 2480114 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2483151 2485881 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2519254 2523748 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2523825 2528592 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2539003 2543804 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2573571 2577234 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2580678 2584045 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2599397 2601991 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2602066 2604534 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2604602 2607537 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2607605 2610403 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2619317 2623014 - You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

2665697 2671431 [ Man On Radio ] As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2671502 2674232 - [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2674305 2677297 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2677375 2680310 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2680378 2682539 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2682614 2684741 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2684816 2689583 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2692657 2696149 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2702433 2706130 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2706204 2708468 You still have your hat on.
2724322 2728622 are you some kind of... ghost?

2738236 2742798 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2744809 2748870 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2748946 2752040 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2752116 2756712 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2759490 2763859 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2763928 2767125 Her body finally just gave it up.

2767198 2771066 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2798963 2801056 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2801132 2806593 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2806671 2811404 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2811476 2814411 Give me something
I could work with.

2819283 2821774 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2821853 2825186 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2825256 2828714 would talk after
what happened to you?

2832096 2834758 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2840805 2845299 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2850181 2854174 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2854252 2857744 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2870468 2874928 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2879610 2882807 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2886450 2889146 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2892190 2898026 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2909106 2912633 [ Gideon ] I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2912710 2915838 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2915913 2918973 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2919050 2922281 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2922353 2924878 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2924956 2929393 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2934565 2937033 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2937101 2939592 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2939670 2945199 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2948112 2953209 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2960491 2962925 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2962994 2964985 What're you tellin' me,
tellin' me this thing is real?

2965062 2968725 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2968799 2972758 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2972837 2976967 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2979777 2984942 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2985016 2988281 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

2991756 2994953 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2995026 2997290 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2997361 3000856 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3000989 3004447 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3004526 3007927 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

3010299 3014065 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3017306 3021970 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3022044 3026413 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3026482 3029178 I ain't makin' all this up.

3029251 3033779 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3042331 3047359 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3057613 3060605 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3069925 3072223 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3074963 3079832 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3079902 3083838 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3155510 3157444 # It can't rain all the time #

3157512 3162040 [ Skipping ]
# Can't rain all the time #

3171126 3173822 [ T-bird ] I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3173895 3176830 One part falls, it all falls!

3176898 3180356 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3180435 3182995 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3188310 3192508 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3244399 3247960 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3276231 3279496 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3290545 3294982 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3296585 3299486 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3299554 3302648 - This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

3309865 3312265 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3313869 3316838 - What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

3323245 3325941 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3331520 3334512 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3340529 3343293 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3362918 3365148 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3376231 3380497 - [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3393782 3397479 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

3420609 3423840 But I don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3423912 3426676 What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3426748 3429842 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3429918 3432079 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3432153 3435418 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3435490 3439085 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3439160 3442596 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3442664 3445929 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3446001 3450904 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3461917 3467116 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3467188 3471279 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3471412 3475371 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3475450 3478886 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3478953 3481319 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3485927 3488896 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3499140 3502075 and felt how awful goodness is."

3572046 3574344 [ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3574415 3576747 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3576818 3581187 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

3581255 3584691 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3584759 3590129 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3590198 3595363 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3595436 3599065 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

3599140 3602940 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3604979 3607709 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3607782 3612719 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

3612787 3616917 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3616991 3620324 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3620395 3625492 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3631406 3636639 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3639147 3643447 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3668109 3671044 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3671112 3674377 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3674449 3678681 - We're gonna have to I.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3680755 3682723 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3694869 3698396 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3701809 3704243 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3704312 3708214 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3708282 3710409 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3710485 3713352 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3713421 3716390 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3716457 3718391 and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

3718459 3720757 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3720828 3722853 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3722930 3724898 You gotta write that shit down.

3726968 3730028 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3730104 3734040 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3737912 3741939 [ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

3792667 3795261 [ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3795336 3798169 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3896304 3900070 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
3900141 3903406 That is from your song, right?
